text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha ao mnoussa lok. pitchea ban mokadl puok anak nouv sachchaphap ampi mcheasa robsa puok anak . haey bokkol na del ban ttuol kar changaoulobangheanh ke nung ttuol banophl la samreab te khluon ke bonnaoh . tebae bokkol na ban v nge v ng vinh ke nung thveu aoy mean krohthnak dl khluoneng . haey khnhom minmen chea anakattuol khosa trauv leu puok anak laey
